Hello,

Thank you for contacting us.
Please clarify what you want to achieve. Do you want to allow the emails ?
If so, since you are using Microsoft Exchange email server, please note the exchange domain list needs to be whitelisted (Exchange Administrative Group) in the email domain whitelist from epp server UI > Denylists and Allowlists - Allowlists.
In this scenario with Exchange domains, you can only whitelist the whole domain, and NOT individual email addresses like user@domain.com.
You will have to include/ check the email domain whitelist inside a content aware policy which targets the client machines, in order to take effect.
This whitelist feature requires "Deep Packet Inspection" setting to be enabled from Device Control > Global settings page.

Thank you and Best regards,
Alin
